articles.author: Gill Clark
articles.title: Pedri bags a brace and Lamine Yamal stars as Spain hammer Northern Ireland - Barca Blaugranes
articles.description: The Barca stars shine at Son Moix
articles.content:
Barcelona duo Pedri and Lamine Yamal starred as Spain beat Northern Ireland 5-1 in a friendly at Son Moix on Saturday.
Pedri scored the first international goal of his career when he levelled after … [+941 chars]
